extendedInfo.description: Bellman act as a time announcer on your Android phone. It helps you keep time with your ears but not eyes. you can shake your phone, or, double-click Play button of headset,  at any time to get time in voice report; It also chime hourly, half-hourly or quarterly for you; and unlimited alarms with various music ringtone and speaking time voice have you to be prompted at any specified time. You can select any music file storaged in SD card by your own to serve as ringtone or chime music.  Features:1. During screen turning off, shake the phone along with horizontal to speak time in voice.Note:  a. The detect shaking service may consume more power.    b. For some devices, especially equip with Android OS version 2.01 and 2.1, the detect shaking service may not work in standby or screen off status because acceleration sensor is disabled in that status.  2. If you are used to wearing headset, now you can get time easily via double-click Play button. Note: Official google Music player should be installed, otherwise playing music couldn't be controlled via headset unless "Speak time on headset" is disabled.3. Chimes hourly, half-hourly or quarterly with options of voice, bell, prelude as well as volume. The prelude may be selected from any music file(such as mp3, wav, mid, ogg, m4a and so on) storaged on SD card.  4. Alarm clock featured with unlimited alarms, countdown starting, music ringtone, speaking time voice, various repeat cycle included custom-built in any seconds, minutes, hours and days. The ringtone may be selected from any music file(such as mp3, wav, mid, ogg, m4a and so on) storaged on SD card.5. Importantly, the voice system of Bellman Pro is opened to users to customize your own voice style. So, in addition to built-in supported languages such as Czech, German, English, Spanish, French, Italian, Russian and Chinese, the app supports any other languages via customizing. How to customize your own voice style? Please visit this page (http://en.cyberhorse-workshop.com/customizevoice.htm)to see details.6. Available voice languages: Chinese, Czech, English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Number one in Chimes.Not reliable for Alarms.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good.
reviews.comment: Keep working on it. Very good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: I\'ve tested the free Bellman for a while, and it worked well on my Defy 2.2.2. So it\'s only right that I buy the Pro version to support the developer! ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bellman Pro
reviews.comment: Checked out all the others and found this one to be the best and with the most potential.  Anyhow, now that I purchased it, I hope to see some upgrades coming.  I would suggest more chimes and more voices (male and female).  Also, how about a menu selection capability of changing the pitch and slowing down the voice and a option of saying am/pm like another reviewer suggested.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great. I was wondering if you could have it say am/pm in the 12hour mode?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great after previous update... I love it... EVO 3D user
reviews.author: A Google User
